Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector

Class RestInboundConnectorBase

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.ConnectorBase
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.InboundConnectorBase
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.RestInboundConnectorBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectorDefinition, InboundConnectorDefinition<org.apache.camel.model.rest.RestsDefinition>, Orchestratable<ConnectorOrchestrationInfo>, IntegrationScenarioProviderDefinition, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
public abstract class RestInboundConnectorBase extends InboundConnectorBase implements InboundConnectorDefinition<org.apache.camel.model.rest.RestsDefinition>
Base class for defining inbound REST connectors via Camel's RestDefinition DSL.

Adapter developers should extend this class and annotate it with @InboundConnector to specify the connector. The configuration of the REST endpoint is done by overriding the configureRest(RestDefinition).

See Also:
  • Infos on attaching transformation between domain models of connector and integration scenario

    • defineInboundEndpoints

      public final void defineInboundEndpoints(org.apache.camel.model.rest.RestsDefinition definition, org.apache.camel.builder.EndpointProducerBuilder targetToDefinition, RoutesRegistry routeRegistry)
      Description copied from interface: InboundConnectorDefinition
      Defines the inbound endpoint(s) for the integration scenario the connector belongs to.
      Specified by:
      defineInboundEndpoints in interface InboundConnectorDefinition<org.apache.camel.model.rest.RestsDefinition>
      Parameters:
      definition - Type that is required to initiate the endpoint.
      targetToDefinition - Target that the inbound endpoint should be connected to (e.g. the final ProcessorDefinition.to(EndpointProducerBuilder) in a RouteDefinition).
      routeRegistry - Route registry that must be used to register routeIds for the inbound endpoint(s).

    • configureRest

      protected abstract void configureRest(org.apache.camel.model.rest.RestDefinition definition)
      Configures the REST endpoint used within this connector.

      Note that while RestDefinition supports specifing multiple verbs/endpoints, all of those will be mapped to the single integration scenario that this connector is linked with though InboundConnectorBase.getScenarioId().

      Parameters:
      definition - the REST endpoint definition
